

```python
import folium
import pandas as pd

# 横浜市公衆トイレ位置データ読込み
in_file = 'public_lavatory_20070401.txt'
df = pd.read_csv(in_file, encoding='utf-8', engine='python', header=None, sep='\t', usecols=[1, 2, 3])
df = df.rename(columns={1: '住所', 2: '緯度', 3: '経度'})
df.head()
```

</div>




```python
yokohama = [35.465514, 139.621753]
m = folium.Map(
    location=yokohama,
    tiles='OpenStreetMap',
    zoom_start=14
)
m
```




<div style="width:100%;"><div style="position:relative;width:100%;height:0;padding-bottom:60%;"><iframe src="data:text/html;charset=utf-8;base64," style="position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;left:0;top:0;border:none !important;" allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen></iframe></div></div>




```python
for i, row in df.iterrows():
    pop = row[['住所']][0]
    latlon = row[['緯度', '経度']]
    folium.CircleMarker(latlon,
        radius=8,
        popup=pop,
        color='#3186cc',
        fill_color='#3186cc').add_to(m)
# m.save('map01.html')
```
